org.framed.orm.ui.editPart.shape

Class ORMSuperShapeEditPart

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.gef.editparts.AbstractEditPart
      • org.eclipse.gef.editparts.AbstractGraphicalEditPart
        • org.framed.orm.ui.editPart.shape.ORMSuperShapeEditPart
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.core.runtime.IAdaptable, org.eclipse.gef.EditPart, org.eclipse.gef.GraphicalEditPart, org.eclipse.gef.NodeEditPart, org.eclipse.gef.RequestConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ORMShapeWithoutSegmentEditPart, ORMShapeWithSegmentEditPart

    public class ORMSuperShapeEditPart
extends org.eclipse.gef.editparts.AbstractGraphicalEditPart
implements org.eclipse.gef.NodeEditPart
    This EditPart is the super/parent EditPart also super/parent controller of all Shapes.
    Author:
    Kay Bierzynski
